name: Skloob's Search
description:
SKLOOB'S SEARCH

Skloob's Search is a small platformer prototype about Skloob, a small critter who's father explodes and scatters themselves across the cosmos. It's up to Skloob to venture out into the universe and put their father back together.

The game is a very early prototype made in about a month in order to test out types of gameplay aswell as visual style.
